subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Alex Ovechkin tallied the winner for Washington 1 minute 55 seconds into overtime, after Brooks Laich’s goal with 47.2 seconds left in regulation evened the score.
snippet: Alex Ovechkin tallied the winner for Washington 1 minute 55 seconds into overtime, after Brooks Laich’s goal with 47.2 seconds left in regulation evened the score.
